text:
Hey folks!
Me again here :slightly_smiling_face:
I’m going through theme Session files and have stumbled upon this piece of code in theme-overrides.css
`{% set button_secondary_bg_color = color(<http://theme.global.buttons.secondary.bg|theme.global.buttons.secondary.bg>_color) %}`
I’m curious whether `color()` is a hubl structure or some preprocessor. It doesn’t look like a native css thing or I’m wrong.

Hope someone could clarify this. Thanks in advance!

*UPD*
Thanks! Never mind, already figured out it’s a macro from _macros.css :blush:
